name: accessibility.cloud
description: Fetches and shows places from accessibility.cloud on your website.
author: The accessibility.cloud team

scripts.build: npm run build-without-push; npm run push-translations; npm run pull-translations
scripts.push-translations: echo '\nPushing new translations to transifex...\n'; WP_LOCALE=en_US  npm run build-without-push; tx push -s
scripts.pull-translations: echo '\nPulling new translations from transifex...\n'; tx pull -a; node ./bin/generate-translations.js
scripts.version: npm run clean && npm run build; cp dist/accessibility.cloud.min.js dist/accessibility.cloud.${npm_package_version}.min.js; for locale_file in translations/accessibility-cloud.js-widget/*_*.po; do locale=$( basename -s .po $locale_file ); echo "\n\nBuilding $locale version..."; WP_LOCALE=$locale npm run build-without-push && mv dist/accessibility.cloud.${locale}.min.js dist/accessibility.cloud.${npm_package_version}-${locale}.min.js; done; git add .
